author: Henry Reed
message: Intuition is the very force or activity of the soul in its experience through whatever has been the experience of the soul itself.
title: Thought of the day

author: Tony Robbins
message: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
title: Thought of the day

author: Pat Riley
message: Courage is not the absence of fear, but simply moving on with dignity despite that fear.
title: Thought of the day

author: Galileo Galilei
message: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.
title: Thought of the day
